ARABIC: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He knows what is in front of them and behind them. But their knowledge does not encompass Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He knows what is before them and hidden from them, but they cannot grasp it with their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He knows all that is ahead of them and all that is behind them, while the others do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God knows all that is in front of them and behind them and they can not encompass His knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He knows all that is before them and all that is behind them, whereas their knowledge cannot encompass it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He knows what happens to them, and what will happen to them, but they will never encompass anything of His knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, while they do not comprehend it in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He knows what is before them and behind them, and they comprehend Him not in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He knoweth (all) that is before them and (all) that is behind them, while they cannot compass it in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, but they cannot encompass Him with their knowledge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He knoweth that which is before them and that which is behind them, and they, encompass it not with their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He knows what is before them and behind them, though they do not comprehend Him in their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He knows what (appears to His creatures as) before or after or behind them: but they shall not compass it with their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Allah) knows what happens to them (His creatures) in this world, and what will happen to them (in the Hereafter), and they will never compass anything of His Knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He knows what is before them and behind them, and they do not comprehend Him in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, and they cannot comprehend Him in their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:110] He knows what is before them, of the affairs of the Hereafter, and behind them, of the affairs of this world, and they do not comprehend such [things] in knowledge: they have no knowledge of such [things].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He knoweth) Allah knows ((all) that is before them) all that is before the angels regarding the matter of the Hereafter (and (all) that is behind them) and all that is behind them regarding the matter of this worldly life, (while they cannot compass it in knowledge) the angels know of that which is before them or behind them only in the measure that Allah teaches them.
